metadata.title: Display Shutdown Button
metadata.description: The system allows shutdown from the logon dialog box.

metadata.title: Clear System Pagefile
metadata.description: System pagefile is cleared upon shutdown.

metadata.title: Removable media devices - Floppies
metadata.description: Floppy media devices are not allocated upon user logon.

metadata.title: Caching of logon credentials
metadata.description: Caching of logon credentials is not limited.

metadata.title: Halt on Audit Failure
metadata.description: System does not halt once an event log has reached its maximum size.

metadata.title: Bad Logon Attempts
metadata.description: Number of allowed bad-logon attempts does not meet minimum requirements.

metadata.title: UR: Act as part of the operating system
metadata.description: UR: Act as part of the operating system

metadata.title: Minimum Password Age
metadata.description: Minimum password age does not meet minimum requirements.

metadata.title: Rename Built-in Guest Account
metadata.description: The built-in guest account must be renamed.

criterion.comment: Verifies built-in guest account has been renamed
Verifies built-in guest account does not exist

metadata.title: Rename Built-in Administrator Account
metadata.description: The built-in administrator account must be renamed.

criterion.comment: Verifies built-in administrator account has been renamed

metadata.title: Event Log Sizes
metadata.description: Event log sizes do not meet minimum requirements.

metadata.title: Forcibly Disconnect when Logon Hours Expire
metadata.description: Users are not forcibly disconnected when logon hours expire.

metadata.title: Dial Up Password Saved
metadata.description: The option to prevent the password in dial-up networking from being saved is not enabled.

metadata.title: Unencrypted Password is Sent to SMB Server.
metadata.description: Unencrypted password is sent to 3rd party SMB Server.

metadata.title: Secure Print Driver Installation
metadata.description: Print driver installation privilege is not restricted to administrators.

metadata.title: Anonymous Access to the Registry
metadata.description: Anonymous access to the Registry is not restricted.

metadata.title: LanMan Authentication Level
metadata.description: The Send download LanMan compatible password option is not set to Send NTLMv2 response only\refuse LM.

metadata.title: Ctrl+Alt+Del Security Attention Sequence
metadata.description: Ctrl+Alt+Del security attention sequence is Disabled.

metadata.title: Deny Access from the Network
metadata.description: User Right to Deny Access to this computer from the network

criterion.comment: Deny Guests
Deny Support_388945a0

metadata.title: V0014229 - Audit Backup and Restore Privileges
metadata.description: V0014229 - Audit Backup and Restore Privileges

metadata.title: Smart Card Removal Option
metadata.description: The Smart Card removal option is set to take no action.

metadata.title: Recovery Console - SET Command
metadata.description: The Recovery Console SET command is enabled.

metadata.title: Recovery Console - Automatic Logon
metadata.description: The Recovery Console option is set to permit automatic logon to the system.

metadata.title: Unsigned Driver Installation Behavior
metadata.description: The unsigned driver installation behavior is improperly set.

metadata.title: SMB Server Packet Signing (if client agrees)
metadata.description: The Windows SMB server is not enabled to perform SMB packet signing when possible.

metadata.title: Encryption of Secure Channel Traffic
metadata.description: Outgoing secure channel traffic is not encrypted when possible.

metadata.title: Signing of Secure Channel Traffic
metadata.description: Outgoing secure channel traffic is not signed when possible.

metadata.title: Computer Account Password Reset
metadata.description: The computer account password is prevented from being reset.

metadata.title: SMB Client Packet Signing (if server agrees)
metadata.description: The Windows SMB client is not enabled to perform SMB packet signing when possible.

metadata.title: Format and Eject Removable Media
metadata.description: Ejection of removable NTFS media is not restricted to Administrators.

metadata.title: Password Expiration Warning
metadata.description: Users are not warned in advance that their passwords will expire.

metadata.title: Global System Objects Permission Strength
metadata.description: The default permissions of Global system objects are not increased.

metadata.title: Idle Time Before Suspending a Session.
metadata.description: Amount of idle time required before suspending a session is improperly set.

metadata.title: Display of Last User Name
metadata.description: The system is configured to allow the display of the last user name on the logon screen.

metadata.title: Audit Access to Global System Objects
metadata.description: Audit Access to Global System Objects is not turned off.

metadata.title: Audit Backup and Restore Privileges
metadata.description: Audit of Backup and Restore Privileges is not turned off.

metadata.title: RPC - Endpoint Mapper Authentication
metadata.description: Client computers required to authenticate for RPC communication.

metadata.title: Publish to Web
metadata.description: File and Folder Publish to Web option unavailable.

metadata.title: Internet Download / Online Ordering
metadata.description: Web Publishing and online ordering wizards prevented from downloading list of providers.

metadata.title: Windows Messenger Experience Improvement
metadata.description: Windows Messenger prevented from collecting anonymous information.

metadata.title: Search Companion Content File Updates
metadata.description: Search Companion prevented from automatically downloading content updates.

metadata.title: HTTP Printer Drivers
metadata.description: Computer prevented from downloading print driver packages over HTTP.

metadata.title: Windows Update Device Drive Searching
metadata.description: Windows is prevented from using Windows Update to search for drivers.

metadata.description: Media Player – First Use Dialog Boxes

metadata.title: Limit Blank Passwords
metadata.description: The use of local accounts with blank passwords is not restricted to console logons only.

metadata.title: Windows Messenger - Do Not Allow To Run
metadata.description: The user is allowed to launch Windows Messenger (MSN Messenger, .NET Messenger).

metadata.title: Windows Messenger - Do Not Start Automatically
metadata.description: Windows Messenger (MSN Messenger, .NET messenger) is run at system startup.

metadata.title: Maximum Machine Account Password Age
metadata.description: The maximum age for machine account passwords is not set to requirements.

metadata.title: Strong Session Key
metadata.description: The system is not configured to require a strong session key.

metadata.title: Domain Controller authentication for unlock
metadata.description: Domain Controller authentication is not required to unlock the workstation.

metadata.title: Storage of Passwords and Credentials
metadata.description: The system is configured to permit storage of credentials or .NET Passports.

metadata.title: Everyone Permissions Apply to Anonymous
metadata.description: The system is configured to give anonymous users Everyone rights.

metadata.title: Sharing and Security Model for Local Accounts
metadata.description: The system is not configured to use the Classic security model.

metadata.title: LAN Manager Hash Value Stored
metadata.description: The system is configured to store the LAN Manager hash of the password in the SAM.

metadata.title: Force Logoff When Logon Hours Expire
metadata.description: Network security: Force logoff when logon hours expire is set to Enabled

metadata.title: LDAP Client Signing
metadata.description: The system is not configured to recommended LDAP client signing requirements.

metadata.title: Session Security for NTLM SSP Based Clients
metadata.description: The system is not configured to meet the minimum requirement for session security for NTLM SSP based Clients.

metadata.title: FIPS Compliant Algorithms
metadata.description: The system is not configured to use FIPS compliant Algorithms for Encryption, Hashing, and Signing.

metadata.title: Owner of Objects Created by Administrators
metadata.description: The system is not configured to make the object creator the owner of objects created by administrators.

metadata.title: Case Insensitivity for Non-Windows
metadata.description: The system is configured to allow case insensitivity.

metadata.title: NetMeeting Disable Remote Desktop Sharing
metadata.description: The system is configured to allow remote desktop sharing through NetMeeting.

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Password Prompting
metadata.description: Terminal Services is not configured to always prompt a client for passwords upon connection.

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Set Encryption Level
metadata.description: Terminal Services is not configured with the client connection encryption set to the required level.

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Do Not Use Temp Folders
metadata.description: Terminal Services is configured to use a common temporary folder for all sessions.

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Delete Temp Folders
metadata.description: Terminal Services is not configured to delete temporary folders.

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Time Limit for Disc. Session
metadata.description: Terminal Services is not configured to set a time limit for disconnected sessions.

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Time Limit for Idle Session
metadata.description: Terminal Services Idle session limit does not meet the requirement.

metadata.title: Terminal Services - Original Client Reconnection
metadata.description: Terminal Services is not configured to allow only the original client to reconnect.

metadata.title: Terminal Services - Enforce Session Time Limit
metadata.description: Terminal Services is not configured to disconnect clients when time limits are exceeded.

metadata.title: Group Policy - Do Not Turn off Background Refresh
metadata.description: The system is configured to prevent background refresh of Group Policy.

metadata.title: Remote Assistance - Offer Remote Assistance
metadata.description: The system is configured to allow unsolicited remote assistance offers.

metadata.title: Error Reporting - Report Errors
metadata.description: The system is configured to automatically forward error information.

metadata.title: Printers - Disallow Installation of Drivers
metadata.description: The system is configured to allow installation of printers using kernel-mode drivers.

metadata.title: Safe DLL Search Mode
metadata.description: The system is not configured to use Safe DLL Search Mode.

metadata.title: Media Player - Disable Automatic Updates
metadata.description: Media Player is configured to allow automatic checking for updates.

metadata.title: Session Security for NTLM SSP based Servers
metadata.description: The system is not configured to meet the minimum requirement for session security for NTLM SSP based Servers.

metadata.title: Audit Log Warning Level
metadata.description: The system does not generate an audit event when the audit log reaches a percent full threshold.

metadata.title: Disable Dead Gateway Detection
metadata.description: The system is configured to allow dead gateway detection.

metadata.title: Disable IP Source Routing
metadata.description: The system is configured to allow IP source routing.

metadata.title: Disable ICMP Redirect
metadata.description: The system is configured to redirect ICMP.

metadata.title: Disable Router Discovery
metadata.description: The system is configured to detect and configure default gateway addresses.

metadata.title: TCP Connection Keep-Alive Time
metadata.description: The system is configured for a greater keep-alive time than recommended.

metadata.title: Name-Release Attacks
metadata.description: The system is configured to allow name-release attacks.

metadata.title: SYN Attack Protection
metadata.description: The system is configured to allow SYN attacks.

metadata.title: TCP Connection Response Retransmissions
metadata.description: TCP connection response retransmissions are not controlled.

metadata.title: TCP Data Retransmissions
metadata.description: TCP data retransmissions are not controlled.

metadata.title: Screen Saver Grace Period
metadata.description: This check verifies that Windows is configured to have password protection take effect within a limited time frame when the screen saver becomes active.

metadata.title: Terminal Services - Secure RPC Connection.
metadata.description: The Terminal Server does not require secure RPC communication.

metadata.title: Group Policy - Registry Policy Processing
metadata.description: Group Policy objects are not reprocessed if they have not changed.

metadata.title: Minimum Password Length
metadata.description: For systems utilizing a logon ID as the individual identifier, passwords are not at a minimum of 14-characters.

metadata.title: File Auditing Configuration
metadata.description: Improper modification of the core system files can render a system inoperable. Further, modifications to these system files can have a significant impact on the security configuration of the system. Auditing of significant modifications made to the system files provides a method of determining the responsible party.</VulnDiscussion><FalsePositives>Automated checking sometimes reports this as a false finding. If a manual review of a questionable finding shows auditing to be set correctly, then this would not be a finding.

criterion.comment: Volumes use NTFS
Audit Object Access Failure
Audit Object Access Failure and Success

criteria.comment: Local volumes audit permissions are set correctly.

criterion.comment: standard_delete: AUDIT_FAILURE
standard_delete: AUDIT_SUCCESS_FAILURE
standard_read_control: AUDIT_FAILURE
standard_read_control: AUDIT_SUCCESS_FAILURE
standard_write_dac: AUDIT_FAILURE
standard_write_dac: AUDIT_SUCCESS_FAILURE
standard_write_owner: AUDIT_FAILURE
standard_write_owner: AUDIT_SUCCESS_FAILURE
file_read_data: AUDIT_FAILURE
file_read_data: AUDIT_SUCCESS_FAILURE
file_write_data: AUDIT_FAILURE
file_write_data: AUDIT_SUCCESS_FAILURE
file_append_data: AUDIT_FAILURE
file_append_data: AUDIT_SUCCESS_FAILURE
file_read_ea: AUDIT_FAILURE
file_read_ea: AUDIT_SUCCESS_FAILURE
file_write_ea: AUDIT_FAILURE
file_write_ea: AUDIT_SUCCESS_FAILURE
file_execute: AUDIT_FAILURE
file_execute: AUDIT_SUCCESS_FAILURE
file_delete_child: AUDIT_FAILURE

metadata.title: Legal Notice (Warning Banner)
metadata.description: Determines if the Legal Notice is configured using the required text.

criterion.comment: Legal Notice is configured with the required text.
Legal Notice is configured with the required text.

metadata.title: Account Lockout Duration
metadata.description: Determines compliance with requirement that locked out accounts require administrator unlock and are not unlocked after a defined lockout duration.

criterion.comment: Tests if account lockout duration is forever

metadata.title: User Rights and Advanced User Rights
metadata.description: Determines compliance with user rights and advanced user rights requirements.

extend_definition.comment: Access from the Network - Administrators
Adjust Memory Quotas - No one except Administrators, LOCAL SERVICE, NETWORK SERVICE
Logon Through Terminal Services - None
Back Up Files and Directories - Administrators
Bypass Traverse Checking - Only Administrators, Users
Change System Time - Only Administrators
Create a Pagefile - Only Administrators
Create a Pagefile - Only Administrators
Create Global Objects - Only Administrators, SERVICE, Local Service, Network Service
Create Permanent Shared Objects - None
Force Shutdown From Remote System - Adminstrators
Generate Security Audits - LOCAL SERVICE, NETWORK SERVICE
Impersonate a Client after Authentication - Administrators, SERVICE
Increase Scheduling Priority - Administrators
Load and Unload Device Drivers - Administrators
Lock Pages in Memory - None
Log On As a Batch Job - None
Log On As a Service - LOGON SERVICE, NETWORK SERVICE
Log On Locally - Administrators, Users
Modify Firmware Environment Values - Administrators
Perform Volume Maintenance Tasks - Administrators
Profile Single Process - Administrators
Profile System Performance - Administrators
Remove Computer From Docking Stations - Administrators, Users
Replace a Process Level Token - LOCAL SERVICE, NETWORK SERVICE
Restore Files and Directories - Administrators
Shut Down the System - Administrators, Users
Take Ownership of Files or Other Objects - Administrators

metadata.title: Maximum password age
metadata.description: Maximum password age is less than 60

metadata.title: Disable Guest Account
metadata.description: The built-in guest account must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies built-in guest account is disabled
Verifies built-in guest account does not exist

metadata.title: System File ACLs
metadata.description: Failure to properly configure ACL file and directory permissions, allows the possibility of unauthorized and anonymous modification to the operating system and installed applications.

criterion.comment: regedit.exe: no rights for non-Administrators, non-System
selected system32 files: no rights for non-Administrators, non-System
mshta.exe: only read/execute for non-Administrators, non-System
mshta.exe: no rights for non-Administrators, non-System, non-Users

metadata.title: Local Users on a Workstation in a Domain
metadata.description: Determines if domain members have any local users (besides built-ins [admin, guest], help, and support).

criterion.comment: System is not a member of a domain
System has no local users (besides local admin, guest, help, and support)

metadata.title: Disable Media Autoplay
metadata.description: Autoplay must be disabled for all drives.

criterion.comment: Verifies AutoRun is disabled on all drives
Verifies the functionality present in KB967715 is enabled
Verifies KB967715 is installed

metadata.title: Power User Restrictions
metadata.description: Determines compliance with requirement that the power users group is empty.

criterion.comment: Tests if there are any members of the Power Users group

metadata.title: Named Pipes Accessed Anonymously
metadata.description: Network access: Named Pipes that can be accessed anonymously

criterion.comment: NullSessionPipes registry key only has specific values COMNAP,COMNODE,SQL\QUERY,SPOOLSS,LLSRPC,browser

criterion.comment: Registry key AllowedPaths is blank
Registry key AllowedPaths only has specific values
Registry key AllowedPaths does not exist

criterion.comment: NullSessionShares registry value is blank
NullSessionShares registry value does not exist
NullSessionShares registry value only has specific values COMCFG,DFS$

metadata.description: Determines if remote control of terminal sessions is allowed.

criterion.comment: Remote control of terminal sessions is not allowed

metadata.title: Use of authorized time servers
metadata.description: Determines if any unauthorized time servers are in use.

criterion.comment: No time server is in use.
No unauthorized time server is in use.

metadata.title: DCOM - Object Registry Permission
metadata.description: Determines if the system has a writable DCOM configuration.

criterion.comment: Tests if there are any DCOM registry keys for which non-system, non-admin users have rights beyond read

metadata.title: IPv6 Transition

criterion.comment: Tests if IPv6 is not enabled on the system.

metadata.title: Software Certificate Installation Files
metadata.description: Software certificate installation files must be removed from a system.

Verifies certificate installation files (*.pfx) are not present on the system

metadata.title: Built-in Admin Account Status
metadata.description: The built-in administrator account must be enabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies the built-in administrator account is enabled

metadata.title: CD-ROM Access Restricted to Locally Logged-on User Only
